column2: Allowes to create WordScanner for cacheBuilder with thread-unsafe lexer

column3: CacheBuilderEP caches WordScanner, so if your Lexer used in scanner is not thread-safe - you've got a problem. This PR allowes to override lexer getter and create new lexer instance on each request.
Allowes to create WordScanner for cacheBuilder with thread-unsafe lexer
